openerSection: The Citi Rewards Credit Card aims at delivering its cardholders with lucrative Reward offers across several categories. With a joining fee of Rs. 1,000, the card offers an amazing opportunity as a welcome benefit to earn up to 2,500 bonus Reward Points. The card offers 1 Reward Point per Rs. 125 spent and 10x Reward Points or purchases made on apparel & departmental stores. Not only this, but one can also receive bonus Reward Points every month by spending Rs. 30,000 or more in a month.

These Reward Points are redeemable against a variety of categories, including fuel, AirMiles, cashback, etc. The card has a nominal yearly fee of Rs. 1,000, which can be waived off on spendingÂ  Rs. 30,000 or more in the previous year. Read on for more information on Citibank Rewards Credit Card.
